title: New: Lupa – Starved
body:
Fifteen year old wunderkid **Lupa** aka Imogen Jones kicked up quite a fuss a month or so back, with the emergence of her two debut tracks, _The Creature_ and The Infinite Colour.

Now, with a whole lot of blog buzz behind her, she’s unleashed her next offering, the intimate, vocal led _Starved_. Less immediate than _The Creature_, and verging away from the Grimes comparisons that ravaged her debut track, Starved builds far more of a dreamy sound of her own. Check out Starved below.
